008 *******************************************************************************/
009package imagingbook.common.geometry.circle;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic.sqr;
012import static java.lang.Math.abs;
013import static java.lang.Math.sqrt;
014
015import java.awt.Shape;
016import java.awt.geom.Arc2D;
017import java.awt.geom.Path2D;
018import java.util.Locale;
019
020import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Primitive2d;
021import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
022import imagingbook.common.geometry.shape.ShapeProducer;
023import imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic;
024
025/**
026 * Represents a geometric circle with center point (xc, yc) and radius r.
027 * Instances are immutable.
028 * 
029 * @author WB
030 *
031 */
032public class GeometricCircle implements ShapeProducer, Primitive2d {
033        
034        /**
035         * Circle parameters.
036         */
037        public final double xc, yc, r;
038
039        @Deprecated             // use field access instead
040        public double getXc() {
041                return xc;
042        }
043        @Deprecated             // use field access instead
044        public double getYc() {
045                return yc;
046        }
047        @Deprecated             // use field access instead
048        public double getR() {
049                return r;
050        }
051
052        public GeometricCircle(double xc, double yc, double r) {
053                if (r < 0) {
054                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("negative circle radius");
055                }
056                this.xc = xc;
057                this.yc = yc;
058                this.r = r;             
059        }
060        
061        /**
062         * Constructor.
063         * Creates a new {@link GeometricCircle} instance from parameters p = [xc, yc, r].
064         * @param p circle parameters [xc, yc, r]
065         */
066        public GeometricCircle(double[] p) {
067                this(p[0], p[1], p[2]);
068        }
069        
070        /**
071         * Constructor.
072         * Creates a new {@link GeometricCircle} from a {@link AlgebraicCircle} instance.
073         * @param ac a {@link AlgebraicCircle} instance
074         */
075        public GeometricCircle(AlgebraicCircle ac) {
076                this(getGeometricCircleParameters(ac));
077        }
078        
079        private static double[] getGeometricCircleParameters(AlgebraicCircle ac) {
080                double[] p = ac.getParameters();
081                if (Arithmetic.isZero(p[0])) {
082                        throw new RuntimeException("infinite circle radius");
083                }
084                double A = p[0];
085                double B = p[1];
086                double C = p[2];
087                double D = p[3];
088                double xc = -B / (2 * A);
089                double yc = -C / (2 * A);
090                double r = sqrt(sqr(B) + sqr(C) - 4 * A * D) / abs(2 * A);
091                return new double[] {xc, yc, r};
092        }
093        
094        // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
095        
096        /**
097         * Return a vector of parameters for this circle.
098         * The length of the vector and the meaning of the parameters depends
099         * on the concrete circle type.
100         * 
101         * @return a vector of parameters
102         */
103        public double[] getParameters() {
104                return new double[] {xc, yc, r};
105        }
106        
107        public Pnt2d getCenter() {
108                return Pnt2d.from(xc, yc);
109        }
110
111        // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
112        
113        /**
114         * Calculates and returns the mean of the squared distances between this circle 
115         * and a set of 2D points.
116         *
117         * @param points a set of sample points (usually the points used for fitting)
118         * @return the mean squared error
119         */
120        public double getMeanSquareError(Pnt2d[] points) {
121                final int n = points.length;
122                double sumR2 = 0;
123                for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
124                        sumR2 += sqr(getDistance(points[i]));
125                }
126                return sumR2 / n;
127        }
128        
129        /**
130         * Returns the (unsigned) distance between the specified point
131         * and this circle. The result is always non-negative.
132         * 
133         * @param p a 2D point
134         * @return the point's distance from the circle
135         */
136        @Override
137        public double getDistance(Pnt2d p) {
138                return Math.abs(getSignedDistance(p));
139        }
140        
141        /**
142         * Returns the signed distance between the specified point
143         * and this circle. The result is positive for points outside
144         * the circle, negative inside.
145         * 
146         * @param p a 2D point
147         * @return the point's signed distance from the circle
148         */
149        public double getSignedDistance(Pnt2d p) {
150                double dx = p.getX() - this.xc;
151                double dy = p.getY() - this.yc;
152                double rp = Math.hypot(dx, dy);
153                return rp - this.r;
154        }
155        
156        // ------------------------------------------------------------------
157
158        private Shape getCenterShape(double radius) {
159                Path2D path = new Path2D.Double();
160                path.moveTo(xc - radius, yc);
161                path.lineTo(xc + radius, yc);
162                path.moveTo(xc, yc - radius);
163                path.lineTo(xc, yc + radius);
164                return path;
165        }
166        
167        private Shape getOuterShape() {
168                return new Arc2D.Double(xc - r, yc - r, 2 * r, 2 * r, 0, 360, Arc2D.OPEN);
169        }
170        
171        @Override
172        public Shape getShape(double scale) {
173                return getOuterShape() ;
174        }
175        
176        @Override
177        public Shape[] getShapes(double scale) {
178                return new Shape[] {getOuterShape(), getCenterShape(scale)};
179        }
180        
181        // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
182        
183        @Override
184        public boolean equals(Object other) {
185                if (this == other) {
186                        return true;
187                }
188                if (!(other instanceof GeometricCircle)) {
189            return false;
190        }
191                return this.equals((GeometricCircle) other, Arithmetic.EPSILON_DOUBLE);
192        }
193        
194        
195        public boolean equals(GeometricCircle other, double tolerance) {
196                return 
197                                Arithmetic.equals(xc, other.xc, tolerance) &&
198                                Arithmetic.equals(yc, other.yc, tolerance) &&
199                                Arithmetic.equals(r, other.r, tolerance) ;
200        }
201        
202        public boolean equals(GeometricCircle other, double tolXc, double tolYc, double tolR) {
203                return 
204                                Arithmetic.equals(xc, other.xc, tolXc) &&
205                                Arithmetic.equals(yc, other.yc, tolYc) &&
206                                Arithmetic.equals(r, other.r, tolR) ;
207        }
208        
209
210        public GeometricCircle duplicate() {
211                return new GeometricCircle(this.getParameters());
212        }
213        
214        @Override
215        public String toString() {
216                return String.format(Locale.US, "%s [xc=%f, yc=%f, r=%f]", 
217                                this.getClass().getSimpleName(), xc, yc, r);
218        }
219}
